medical_history.chief_complaint: Nonconvulsive status epilepticus resulting from benzodiazepine withdrawal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient exhibited unusual behavior for several days prior to admission, including difficulty dressing and impaired short-term memory. He had been taking low-dose alprazolam and stopped it suddenly.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Renal insufficiency and generalized anxiety disorder; no history of seizures.
medical_history.social_history: The patient stopped drinking many years previously and did not report illicit drug use.
